HOME.DESC1: Think you've got the skills? Take the Planet2050 Quiz to see how environmentally savvy you are!
HOME.DESC2: Catch up on all the skills you need to know to keep our planet safe!
HOME.DESC3: Change the application language to one you would be more familiar with!

QUESTIONS.question: Which of the following is the main reason for producing the atmospheric greenhouse effect?
options: Absorption and re-emission of ultraviolet radiations by the atmosphere
Absorption and re-emission of infrared radiations by the atmosphere
Absorption and re-emission of visible light by the atmosphere
QUESTIONS.answer: Absorption and re-emission of infrared radiations by the atmosphere

QUESTIONS.question: The salinization can be defined as -
options: Accumulation of salts in the body
Accumulation of salts in the soil
QUESTIONS.answer: Accumulation of salts in the soil

QUESTIONS.question: The main reason for blueness of the sky is -
options: Due to the presence of water vapor
Due to the absorption of blue light due to the air
Due to the scattering of sunlight by air molecules
QUESTIONS.answer: Due to the scattering of sunlight by air molecules

QUESTIONS.question: Which of the following is the cause of soil pollution?
What is the water vapor?
options: It is the gaseous phase of water
Water vapor is the cloud droplet
QUESTIONS.answer: It is the gaseous phase of water

QUESTIONS.question: Which of the following is the cause of Melanornia (skin cancer)?
The yellowness of the Taj Mahal is an effect of -
The part of the plant that evaporates water is -
At what time of the day relative humidity in the environment is at minimum?
options: When the air temperature is lowest
When the air temperature is higher
QUESTIONS.answer: When the air temperature is higher

QUESTIONS.question: What is hibernation?
options: Adaptation of animals to escape from predators

QUESTIONS.question: What is aestivation?
options: Adaptation of animals to escape from predators

QUESTIONS.question: Which of the following gas is present in the air in maximum amount?
The solar cell converts which energy into electrical energy?
Which of the following is a renewable source of energy?
The process of changing the solid into a liquid by supplying the heat is called as -
